content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: beacon
inventory=[{"type": "obsidian", "quantity": 3, "index": 15}, {"type": "magenta_carpet", "quantity": 39, "index": 20}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 64, "index": 28}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 5, "index": 36}, {"type": "skeleton_spawn_egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 39}, {"type": "lava_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft a beacon, I need to place 5 glass blocks in a cross pattern in the crafting grid, with the nether_star in the middle. I will start by moving a glass block from slot 36 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: beacon
inventory=[{"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "obsidian", "quantity": 3, "index": 15}, {"type": "magenta_carpet", "quantity": 39, "index": 20}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 64, "index": 28}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 4, "index": 36}, {"type": "skeleton_spawn_egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 39}, {"type": "lava_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: I now need to move another glass block to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 2 with quantity 1
